Segment.name: L0
Segment.comment: To specify quantity, weight, volume, and type of service for a line item including applicable "quantity/rate-as" data

Field.name: LadingLineItemNumber
Field.comment: Sequential line number for a lading item

Field.name: BilledRatedAsQuantity
Field.comment: Basis for rating (miles, value, volume, etc.); Note: Weight may be defined by either data element 220 or 81

Field.name: BilledRatedAsQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of quantity or value on which the rate or item pricing is based

Field.name: WeightQualifier
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: PackagingFormCode1
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: TypeOfServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying extent of transportation service requested

Field.name: PackagingFormCode2
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
